name: Dummy Human
desc: A loyal but stupid human, ready to stand up to anything in their way

name: Fighter Human
desc: A dummy human equipped with a bat

name: Sword Human
desc: A dummy human equipped with a super sharp sword

name: Explosive Human
desc: A dummy human who throws grenades
passive.name: Explosive grenade

name: Defender Human
desc: A dummy human who has friends
pDesc: takes all incoming damage to any of your cards
passive.name: Protect my friends
passive.ability: redirect Xteam self all, on Xteam attack

name: Toxic Human
desc: A dummy human who plays rocket league
passive.name: Toxic

name: Healing Human
desc: A dummy human with a first aid kit
pDesc: Every turn adds 1 hitpoint to adjacent team cards and themself
passive.name: Heal
Healself

name: Spike Human
desc: A dummy human who throws sharp spikes and wears spike armor
pDesc: attacks pierce through opponents cards, dealing damage to the opposing player
passive.name: Piercing Spikes

name: Icy Human
desc: A dummy human who freezes opponents
pDesc: icy attacks slows the opposing card, causing them to permanently take one extra turn to attack
passive.name: Cold ice

name: Mirror Human
desc: A dummy human who stole a special mirror
pDesc: reflects half of incoming damage (rounds down)
passive.name: Reflective mirror

name: Team Human
desc: A dummy human who can work with others
pDesc: If three or more team humans are played in your hand, all team humans deal +2 damage
passive.name: Teamwork

name: Mercenary Human
desc: A dummy human who sells dead bodies
passive.name: Bounty hunter

name: Money Human
desc: A dummy human who has a job
passive.name: Cash generation

name: Engineer Human
desc: A dummy human that has robots
pDesc:
Does +2 damage to bots
Adjacent bots regenerate +1 health per round
passive.name: Increased Bot damage
passive.ability: buffdamage Oself 2, if attribute Xtarget = bot
passive.name: Increased Bot health 1
passive.ability: heal Oleft 1, if id attribute Oleft = bot, on Oself attack
passive.name: Increased Bot health 2
passive.ability: heal Oright 1, if id attribute Oright = bot, on Oself attack
